description:
When they`re thrown into the Sweets Zone`s underground, Taiki`s team learns that they`ve entered the factory where the Bagra Army has been forcing local Digimon to build the ultimate weapon. Cutemon believes his parents are among the captives, so everyone sets out find them and free the Zone`s Digimon. However, the Bagra Army`s ultimate weapon, Breakdramon, is near completion. Xros Heart attacks in hope of stopping it, but matters are complicated when Matadormon shows up...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Ultimate Weapon Activates! You Can Do It, Cutemon!
最終兵器発動! がんばれキュートモン!
